游戏是好，但是···············不要开箱子！不要开箱子！不要开箱子！不要开箱子！不要开箱子！不要开箱子！

Even if you play with friends this game has been ruined by some of the most toxic people you will ever meet and turn you into a toxic pool of hate for other people. Not to mention the gambling that will suck your wallet faster then my ex.
I don't hate the game. I just think the community that makes up this game are children that just learned how to swear, grown adults that just bully you, people that don't know how to press the "w" button getting your entire team stuck in a doorway causing the entire team to get wiped by one person, oh and I cant forget the people that get mad at you for being new to the game(there's a special place in hell for you). I'm pretty sure this all stems from emotional problems in their youth that they never learned how to deal with so they just take it out on people online, or maybe these people spend so much time playing that they get offended as soon as someone starts doing well and just has to go out of their way to ruin that person's time in the game. 

[u]Then again what can I expect from an online game that has 0 moderation except for team-killing. [/u]
Am I still gonna play this game? Probably, why? Because this is the only game my friends play and half of them either don't have the power or internet connection to run anything else.
Naaaa es muy bueno este juego
Makes me wanna kill myself but in a fun way. 10/10
Look this game is amazing. Was always amazing.
